% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	& {u^{*}} \\
	{(\id_{I})^{*} \circ u^{*}} & {u^{*}} & {u^{*} \circ (\id_{J})^{*}}
	\arrow[Rightarrow, no head, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\eta_{I}u^{*}}"', curve={height=6pt}, from=1-2, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{u^{*}\eta_{J}}", curve={height=-6pt}, from=1-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\mu_{\id_{I},u}}"', from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\mu_{u,\id_{J}}}", from=2-3, to=2-2]
\end{tikzcd}
